item.title: Use iPad as a Selfie Mirror?
item.description: Do you consider getting yourself a mirror for selfies? Or maybe you already have one, and it is not exactly what you want because you want to put yourself precisely into the frame. In this case, VlogMonitor might be the solution you want.
